world.physics: Space physics with zero gravity. Laser bullets travel in straight lines at high speed. Aliens move in formation patterns.
world.visualStyle: Retro space battle scene with dark cosmic background, bright laser effects, and classic alien formations.
world.worldDescripiton: A dark space battlefield with stars in the background, alien invaders descending in formation, and intense laser combat.

player.render: A sleek space fighter ship with angular design, metallic hull, and glowing cyan energy cores.

emissions.render: Bright cyan laser beams that shoot rapidly upward, creating intense light trails and explosive impacts.

objects.name: AlienInvader
objects.behavior: Moves in tight formation patterns, descending slowly toward Earth while occasionally shifting horizontally.
objects.interactionDescription: Explodes with bright flashes when hit by laser bullets, awarding points and clearing the threat.

objects.name: AlienCommander
objects.behavior: Leads alien formations with more aggressive movement patterns and higher resilience.
objects.interactionDescription: Requires multiple hits to destroy, explodes dramatically with bonus points when defeated.
